attributes.action: reject the Olympic logo designed by Wolff Olins and run a public competition for a new one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Olympic logo created by design firm Wolff Olins and foisted on us by the London Organising Committee has been roundly rejected by the British public. 
It would be more of an embarrassment to London and Britain to keep the logo than to admit the mistake and design a new one.
Therefore, we call on the Prime Minister to instruct the London Organising Committee to run a public competition to find a design for a new logo.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
